scripts.build-scss: cat style.scss | node_modules/.bin/sass --load-path node_modules/ --load-path node_modules/nhsuk-frontend/packages/nhsuk/ style.scss --style expanded > style.css | cat style-gutenburg.scss | node_modules/.bin/sass --load-path node_modules/ --load-path node_modules/nhsuk-frontend/packages/nhsuk/  style-gutenburg.scss --style expanded > style-gutenburg.css
scripts.zip: zip -r nhsblocks.zip ./ -x .git .gitignore *.git/* .DS_Store .package.json .package-lock.json *.scss webpack.config.js nhsblocks.zip  postcss.config.css README.md .wordpress-org/**\* .ds_store vendor/**\* node_modules/**\* src/**\* webpack.config.js n
